definition: to send away to serve a penal sentence
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Early warning could enable the government to allocate(11) money and resources to potential disaster areas before disaster strikes.
sentences.chinese: 早期預警可以使政府提前發配物資到潛在災區。

sentences.english: North Korean football players sent to coal mine after World Cup loss?
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮隊員發配煤礦，敗軍之將的歸國命運？

sentences.english: Last time,he sent me to a weather ship in the Antactic!
sentences.chinese: 上次他把我發配到了南極的一艘氣象飛船上。
